Name: NETSH - Create URL ACL
Description: Creates an HTTP URL ACL using NETSH.

Properties.Octopus.Action.Script.ScriptBody:
$url = $OctopusParameters['Url']
$user = $OctopusParameters['User']
$delegate = $OctopusParameters['Delegate']

$delacl = "http delete urlacl url=$url"
$addacl = "http add urlacl url=$url user=$user delegate=$delegate"

write-host "Removing ACL: $delacl"
$delacl | netsh | out-host

write-host "Creating ACL: $addacl"
$addacl | netsh | out-host

Parameters.Name: Url
Parameters.Label: Url
Parameters.HelpText: The url that you wish to bind to, for example: http://+:8080

Parameters.Name: Delegate
Parameters.Label: Delegate?
Parameters.HelpText: Indicates whether or not the user can delegate urls.

Parameters.Name: User
Parameters.Label: User
Parameters.HelpText: Specifies the user of the user group name.
